title: The Human journey: the family
creator_credit: Bob Conroy, CTV News and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Examines the evolution of the family as a social unit and discusses the problems resulting from modern families becoming increasingly smaller and more isolated. Suggests communal living, restructured neighbourhoods, and extended families as methods for making family life emotionally more comfortable.
